titles.title: Congratulating the Tennessee Volunteers for winning the undisputed national championship in college football and Coach Phillip Fulmer for being honored as Coach of the Year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/2/1999--Introduced. Congratulates: (1) the Tennessee Volunteers for winning the undisputed national championship in college football; and (2) Coach Phillip Fulmer for being honored as Coach of the Year.
